Name: Big Earth
About the game: THE BIG EARTH Big Earth is a platform game with challenging puzzles and stunning visuals. Embark in this tiny-huge adventure alongside Dr Kyle Seed, and witness first-hand his journey to recover Earth and restore humankind's future. Nature is imposing essential questions on us, and Big Earth brings perfective to the discussion and reminds us that our survival in this world as species depends essentially on our relationship to our planet and its resources. VISUAL EXPERIENCE Follow Kyle Seed to recover scientific resources across dazzling tiny biomes, exploring nature and its beauty from the perspective of the audacious scientist in this photographic adventure with a unique visual experience. Explore environments recreated with over 15000 pictures of plants, insects and real animals maded in nature reserves. CONTEMPLATE Change the speed of time and enjoy the view. Contemplate natural life and all its beauty in slow motion. Big Earth is a visual experience like nothing you've experienced before. PUZZLES Its intricate puzzles lead the thinking, creativity and skills necessary to solve various challenges on the journey through jungles, forests and dunes. Solve challenging puzzles using seeds and energy capsules. Look for the resources that can be used for the recovery of the planet. Find the equipment that will grow you back to a normal size. PUZZLE-PLATFORMER Big Earth's intricate puzzles will challenge your creativity and skills. Solve them by using the seeds and energy capsules collected along your way. Jump, dash, change the speed of time, plant your platforms, and don't forget: nature is always on your side (even when it doesn't look like it). Keep an eye open for the resources that will recover the planet and the equipment capable of restoring you to your standard size. HEAD UP DISPLAY Hide the HUD to take photographs and collect memories of the journey. ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK Dr Kyle Seed's mesmerising journey is wrapped in an contemplative original soundtrack that transports the player to a relaxing and challenging environment and sets the mood to the adventure.
